formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'KeepAlive' =-
[Synopsis] returns AST_PBX_KEEPALIVE value
[Description] KeepAlive(): This application is chiefly meant for internal use with Gosubs. Please do not run it alone from the dialplan!
